price: Ang Gabi ng Pagtatakda ay higit na mabuti kaysa sa isang libong buwan.
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
